Metaphone 3

A

ALTERNATE_METAPH - member variable in (Metaphone 3 Toolkit globals)
flag to send in to Homeophone Engine calls when you want the alternate encoded Metaphone3 key to be returned or used.
APPROXIMATE - member variable in (Metaphone 3 Toolkit globals)
flag to send in to Homeophone Engine calls when you want the approximate keys to be used.

C

CUTOFF_SCORE - member variable in (Metaphone 3 Toolkit globals)
Constant representing the largest Levenshtein Distance score that a returned word can have from the initial search string and still be included in the processed version of the results.

D

DEFAULT_MAX_KEY_LENGTH - member variable in (Metaphone 3 Toolkit globals)
Default maximum length of encoded key.

E

Encode() - member function in class Metaphone3
Encodes input string to one or two key values according to Metaphone 3 rules.
EXACT - member variable in (Metaphone 3 Toolkit globals)
flag to send in to Homeophone Engine calls when you want the "exact" keys to be used.

G

GET_DEFINITIONS - member variable in (Metaphone 3 Toolkit globals)
flag to send into getResultsListWithDefinitions() when you want definitions, if any, to be returned with the result list
GetAlternateMetaph() - member function in class Metaphone3
Retrieves alternate encoded key, if any.
GetAlternateMetaph(bool) - member function in class HomeophoneEngine
Retrieve the alternate Metaphone3 encoding of the input string, if any.
getDefinition() - member function in class scoredHomeophone
Retrieve a pointer to the character string storing the definition of the word.
GetEditDistanceMatches(bool) - member function in class HomeophoneEngine
Retrieve the Edit Distance/Levenshtein Distance matches to the original search string with a Levenshtein distance score of six or less.
GetEncodeExact() - member function in class Metaphone3
Retrieves setting determining whether or not consonants will be encoded "exactly".
GetEncodeVowels() - member function in class Metaphone3
Retrieves setting determining whether or not non-initial vowels will be encoded.
GetKeyLength() - member function in class Metaphone3
Retrieves maximum number of characters currently allocated for encoded key.
GetMatches(bool,bool) - member function in class HomeophoneEngine
Return a list of matches to the phonetic encoding of the input string ranked by Levenshtein distance.
GetMaximumKeyLength() - member function in class Metaphone3
Retrieves maximum number of characters allowed for encoded key.
GetMetaph() - member function in class Metaphone3
Retrives primary encoded key.
GetMetaph(bool) - member function in class HomeophoneEngine
Retrieve the primary Metaphone3 encoding of the input string.
GetResultsList() - member function in class HomeophoneEngine
The best available list of homeophone matches against the original search string is ranked for similarity to the original search string in a number of vectors.
GetResultsListWithDefinitions(bool) - member function in class HomeophoneEngine
The best available list of homeophone matches against the original search string is ranked for similarity to the original search in a number of vectors.
getScore() - member function in class scoredHomeophone
Retrieve the Levenshtein distance score.
getString() - member function in class scoredHomeophone
Retrieve the word as a std::string object.
getWord() - member function in class scoredHomeophone
Retrieve the word as a pointer to a character string.

H

HomeophoneEngine - class in Metaphone 3 Toolkit
The Homeophone Engine is a class that takes a search string, which is presumed to be a correctly or incorrectly spelled english word, or a name that might be familiar to americans, and returns a ranked list of words found in its dictionary that are calculated to sound similar, according to a programmer-variable definition of similarity.
HomeophoneEngine(void) - constructor in class HomeophoneEngine
Homeophone Engine constructor.
~HomeophoneEngine(void) - constructor in class HomeophoneEngine
Homeophone Engine destructor.

M

MAIN_METAPH - member variable in (Metaphone 3 Toolkit globals)
flag to send in to Homeophone Engine calls when you want the primary encoded Metaphone3 key to be returned or used.
MAX_KEY_ALLOCATION - member variable in (Metaphone 3 Toolkit globals)
Default size of key storage allocation
Metaphone3 - class in Metaphone 3 Toolkit
Metaphone 3 is designed to return an approximate phonetic key (and an alternate approximate phonetic key when appropriate) that should be the same for english words, and most names familiar in the United States, that are pronounced "similarly".
Metaphone3() - constructor in class Metaphone3
Constructor, default.
Metaphone3(const char*) - constructor in class Metaphone3
Constructor, parameterized.

N

NO_DEFINITIONS - member variable in (Metaphone 3 Toolkit globals)
flag to send into getResultsListWithDefinitions() when you do NOT want definitions, if any, to be returned with the result list

O

operator<(const scoredHomeophone&) - member function in class scoredHomeophone
Comparison operator required for objects which are to be stored in sorted order in collection objects.

P

PHONETIC - member variable in (Metaphone 3 Toolkit globals)
flag to send in to GetEditDistanceMatches() when you want the word set to be words in the database that start with the same SOUND as the initial search string

S

scoredHomeophone - class in Metaphone 3 Toolkit
The scoredHomeophone class is a data class designed to wrap a word which is a homeophone of the initial search string, its edit distance (Levenshtein distance) score from this initial search string, and a definition, if any.
scoredHomeophone(int,char*) - constructor in class scoredHomeophone
Paramertized constructor initialized with Levenshtein distance score, and the word in question.
setDefinition(char*) - member function in class scoredHomeophone
Store the definition of the word.
SetEncodeExact(bool) - member function in class Metaphone3
Sets flag that causes Metaphone3 to encode consonants as exactly as possible.
SetEncodeVowels(bool) - member function in class Metaphone3
Sets flag that causes Metaphone3 to encode non-initial vowels.
SetKeyLength(unsigned short) - member function in class Metaphone3
Sets length allocated for output keys.
setScore(int) - member function in class scoredHomeophone
Set the Levenshtein distance score.
SetWord(char*) - member function in class HomeophoneEngine
Sets word to be encoded.
SetWord(const char*) - member function in class Metaphone3
Sets word to be encoded.
SPELLING_ONLY - member variable in (Metaphone 3 Toolkit globals)
flag to send in to GetEditDistanceMatches() when you want the word set to be words in the database that start with the same LETTER as the initial search string
